name: Modern Standard Korean II
description: As a continuation of EAS110Y1, this course is designed to help students improve their skills in the Korean language.  Students in this course are expected to perform basic communicative functions, read and write paragraph-level texts, and conjugate verbs/adjectives accurately. Interviews are required of all students who wish to enrol in the course. See www.eas.utoronto.ca/languages/korean for details.
prerequisites: EAS110Y1 (63% minimum)/equivalent as determined by the Korean placement interview
